subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: An all-American at Oklahoma, Stacey Dales now plays in the W.N.B.A. She also works for ESPN as a college football and basketball sideline reporter and as a studio analyst for college basketball games.
snippet: An all-American at Oklahoma, Stacey Dales now plays in the W.N.B.A. She also works for ESPN as a college football and basketball sideline reporter and as a studio analyst for college basketball games.
